name: City Backpackers HQ
description:
City Backpackers HQ, in the very heart of Brisbane. Want to be close to all the action? Then City Backpackers HQ is the place for you! Only minutes from all the best shopping, bars, restaurants and nightlife, with options to suit all our travellers, those on a shoe string budget or those who want to splash the cash.

Take to the streets of all that Brisbane and South East Queensland have to offer, or kick back on one of our fabulous decks with sprawling City and River views, pool with spectacular river city views, movie lounge with a wide range of movies to choose from or stay connected with friends and family around the world with our free Wi-Fi.

THIS IS HOSTEL IS FOR INTERNATIONAL BACKPACKERS ONLY WE REQUIRE AND INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT ON CHECK-IN
This is to ensure you are sharing the room with genuine travellers. 

Our Location:
Situated in the city centre with extensive views of the river and the city, City Backpackers HQ is the place to be! In walking distance from the best shops, bars and restaurants and new entertainment precincts; making it the perfect place to catch a movie, have a drink with friends or buy those much needed essentials.

Take a short stroll or ride along the river walking paths and bikeways. Not your thing? Then catch some rays at the famous South Bank beach and sample the delights of the many weekend markets Brisbane has to offer.

YOU MUST HAVE A VALID CREDIT CARD TO MAKE THIS BOOKING, ALL NON-REFUNDABLE BOOKINGS WILL BE CHARGED IMMEDIATELY AT TIME OF BOOKING, ALL OTHER RESERVATIONS WILL BE CHARGED THE DAY BEFORE ARRIVAL

CHECK-IN POLICY
Please note that the latest staff assisted check in is 11pm. Only prior organised after hours check in is possible. There are certain criteria which will need to be met. Please contact us to request assistance.

In order for us to allow after hours check in (after Midnight) we will require the following:

* Copy of your Passport from anyone checking in

Once we receive this, with notice, we can give instructions on how to obtain your key and how to get to your room.
hostelworldSays: City Backpackers HQ features a rooftop swimming pool, a cinema room, free car parking, free Wi-Fi, a large kitchen, and clean and comfortable private rooms and dorm rooms. The rooftop terrace is particularly popular with Hostelworld guests, one of whom told us, "I loved the top of the hostel where you can enjoy a view over the city and look at the stars". They're located close to the river and near the rest of the city centre

houseRules.notes:
The price includes the use of all bed linen, free WiFi and free tea/coffee and use of our kitchen facilities, pool and common areas

Please note we are a hostel for international backpackers only you must have a valid international passport for check in.

For bookings prior to arrival we accept only Visa and MasterCard.

You must be at least 18 years old to stay at City Backpackers HQ, we do not allow children.

City Backpackers HQ is unable to guarantee all members of group bookings will be accommodated in the same room.
We offer discounted rates for guests who book directly 7 days or more, these are non-refundable if you depart early.
Once the balance is paid and the reservation is checked in, all payments are non-refundable.
When you create a booking with us, the first night's accommodation will be charged and held as a deposit to secure your reservation. If the reservation is cancelled within the free cancellation period, this will be refunded back to you.

Reception is open from 07:30 until 23:00

If you need any additional information, please don't hesitate to contact us at any time.

We look forward to seeing you soon.

House rules:
1. No drugs in the hostel.
2. Alcohol is permitted between 12:00pm and 9pm only. Drink responsibly or your booking may be cancelled. 
3. No smoking indoors, if the fire alarm is activated by smoking, vaping or candles etc. The fine of $1500 will be charged to you.
4. Our facilities are for our guests with an active reservation only. Please visit your friends outside the hostel.
5. Drink in moderation. If you drinking becomes a problem we have the right to ask you to leave, and we will.
6. Your belongings are your responsibility. Keep your eyes on your things – we take no responsibility for lost or stolen items.
7. Let us know if you plan to stay longer than your reservation. If you don’t book ahead your bed may be sold to someone else.
8. If you are caught stealing someone else’s food or drink you will be immediately evicted.
9. We have the right to evict anyone for unlawful, inappropriate or violent behaviour. If you refuse to leave when asked, you are trespassing and we will call the police.
10. Management reserves the right to refuse entry to any guest at check-in.
These rules need to be respected by every guest at City Backpackers HQ

We want everyone to feel safe and welcome!
Please don’t hesitate to ask us for help or advice.

City Backpackers HQ Management !

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
